markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Comealong](/Equipment.aspx?ID=865)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 114

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This portable winch consists of a length of cable or chain, two hooks, and a ratcheting drum with a handle. When used with two sections of rope or chain, it allows you to pull a heavy load along a flat surface.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Comealong
